title: AI App Factory + UGC Pipeline
description:
Build end-to-end app development and marketing pipeline:
1. Spencer app template system (standardized skeleton with paywalls, onboarding, analytics)
2. App Store scraper for competitor review analysis
3. UGC video pipeline (TikTok scraper → script → avatar → video assembly → 20 videos/day)
4. Marketing agent for content strategy and Meta Ads
5. Pipeline dashboard to track all apps

First step: Build ONE app together to establish Spencer's template, then scale to 30 apps.
